title: To the guy who bullied me yesterday in the class yesterday
content:
You messed up with the wrong guy dude, I just got access to your email account which is linked to your pesu academy. This is a straight up warning to not mess around with me, I can do a lot more damage if you proceed bullying further.

Yours truly,
Anonymous

comments.body:

The kid:
you are not him lil bro
i guess the bully got him , deleted the post xD
